ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Trial number
How much do you like to consume this drink? (Alcohol)
Notes: 1= Not at all; 2= Not really; 3= A little bit; 4= A lot

ElementDescription: How much do you like to consume this drink? (Soft drink)
Notes: 1= Not at all; 2= Not really; 3= A little bit; 4= A lot

ElementDescription: Use since surgery - Legal charges: Since your surgery, have you ever driven while intoxicated? Or believe that you were driving in an impaired state?
Use since surgery - Legal charges: How often has this happened since surgery?
Use since surgery - Legal charges: Have you received any Driving While Intoxicated (DWI) or Driving under the influence (DUI) or other alcohol-related driving charges?
Use since surgery – Functional impairment - Since your surgery, how many times have you actually tried to stop, cut down on, or better control your drinking?
Alcohol use prior to surgery - favorite type of alcoholic drink -Other specify
Use since surgery – Functional impairment - How many days out of the week do you get strong desires to drink?
Use since surgery – Functional impairment - Do desires/urges to drink happen when you are around bars or people you have drank with in the past?
Use since surgery – Functional impairment - How many times missed work, school, arrived late because you were intoxicated, hung over?
Use since surgery – Functional impairment - On average where do you typically drink?
Notes: 0= Other; 1= At your home; 2= At the home of someone else; 3= Restaurant; 4= Bar; 999= Missing or blank
